title: Awesome (unless you have Lollipop)
comment: For years has been the best in this category.  But can't read sdcard now.

title: Excellent
comment: Uses up only required permissions and I loved the colour shade in particular which is so very much unlike the average hash calculators.

title: Work for what I need
comment: Only requiring the basic minimalistic permissions. Great little app.
Works great, very friendly UI. Clean and simple. Includes all common algorithms, Thank you!

title: Excellent!!
comment: Does what it should do. Fast and reliant. Easy to use. Well done!!
Simple and does what it should perfectly
Really handy + great design

title: I'm very happy with this one!
comment: It hashes perfectly! And it seems to be the only one that has no permissions! Give yourself a pat on the back DEV! Seriously! Great job!
Does not convert hash to text
The goal of hashing is not to revert back to input.

title: Nice UX
comment: This application offers a great user experience. Easy to use and quick.  Clear and copy buttons really helps.
Best in play store

title: NICE
comment: I'd love to see the ability to automatically add the CRC-32 to a filename, and verify the CRC-32 from the filename ( like RapidCRC does ). I'd also love to be able to Share a file TO this app for a quick way to add a file to it.   5 Stars Anyway!
If you add more hash algorithm i will give you five stars!

title: THE BEST HASHING UTILITY!
comment: Hands down this is the best file hasher for the Android!

title: Just works
comment: Reasonably fast on Note 3 for 4Gb file.

title: Get this app.
comment: In such desperate times, you need as much security as you can get. Do yourself a favor and use this app

title: Minimal permissions.
comment: 5 stars for minimal permission requirements. I'd like to see a design improvement (overhaul). Maybe something like a one pager with Algorithm drop down menu to the right, text field (calculated hash) to the left, and below that make two buttons (Import from file and Calculate for a file). Then a PLUS sign below those that when clicked, adds another set of the above mentioned for another hash and a "Compare" button below that.

title: Missing 1 feature
comment: I love It works great but needs the ability to remember last used algorithm instead of always using MD5 by default.

title: One of the best
comment: Has md5 and sha1

title: Yup, does as expected
comment: Appreciate the lack of permissions needed!
Perfect! No risky permissions needed. Works Flawless

title: Perfect
comment: So easy to use, doesn't get much better. Could use a better UI, but functions well.

title: Non intrusive and clean
comment: 'Nuff said on title

title: Perfect.
comment: Super easy and fast to use. Icon bugs me though. Green vertical lines makes it look like a compressed JPEG with visual artifacts. Looks worse on my homescreen.

title: Excellent.
comment: Free,  no ad, no special permission required.

title: Realy usefull
comment: I love it

title: Simply Perfect
comment: Simple. Efficient. Does it's job perfectly. Thanks for building this for us.

title: Nice...
comment: EXcelent

title: First rate
comment: Works well, easy to use and a good range of hash functions
Nice

title: Does what it says.
comment: And free/libre open source. :)

title: Simple
comment: Really simple and direct. Has all the features you wish in a hashing app.

title: Does what it says!!
comment: I LOVE LOVE LOVE how it doesn't require any special permissions

title: SHA-3 Keccak implementation please.
comment: Best hashing app I have so far but could you implement the new SHA-3 Keccak as well? That would be great.

title: No extra permissions!
comment: Honestly, it deserves five stars just for being the first app I've seen with no special permissions needed. It also does everything it says it does.  I would love something that also converts between Hex, Base58/60/64, and Bitcoin's 'Poetry'.

title: Does what it promised.
comment: No additional permissions required. Very useful.
Hash me, baby!

title: Excellent
comment: This asp works well, and needs no special permissions. Nice work!

title: Superb!
comment: Tried many but this is the best and cleanest hash checker around. One option I would like to see is the ability to set a default location/folder for opening files. Now you have to drill down from / to the file you want to open. Otherwise perfect!!

title: I love it
comment: Thanks for creating this useful tools. Now I can create a secure hash. Can you make the ability to convert hash back to words. Thank you.

title: Good app no 4.4 support
comment: Does not read files in 4.4 sense 5.5 fix and I will make 5 stars

Added external storage read permission for KitKat. 
Correction delivered with version 3.2.
Please update your app.
Needs to allow checking files using a hash in a file (sha1sum/md5sum output)

title: Nice, but...
comment: Overall, good app, but it would be better if:  1. Swiping to the sides switched panes 2. If pressing the back button brought up a prompt asking if the user wanted to quit the currently running checksum.  2 would be especially useful with large files. Right now, if I want to stop the current checksum I have to kill the app and restart it.

title: very well
comment: nice app!

title: MD1 and MD3 please
comment: MD1 for my app hash! :(

title: Legendary in design and function
comment: Simple, Clean, Open Source. The very heart of what android programming is about. By far the quickest, cleanest digest comparison app that I've tried and I've gone through quite a few. Love the open source clarity and lack of needed permissions. A permanent addition to my system tools.

title: Best hash checker
comment: Ver y helpful un verifying roms
Excellent.  Could not be better.

title: Excellent
comment: It works as expected

title: Does the job
comment: Would be nice if you could hash a file then click compare and have the md5 populate in compare so you could paste one copied from the clipboard into the other.

title: One-Stop Hash
comment: Just one suggestion: the text hash should allow the user to choose whether end-of-line is CR (Mac), LF (Android) or CRLF (Win) -- if it's not the same one the original writer used, an otherwise identical text won't give a match.

title: Not 5 but 10
comment: This is a very good application, not the best of a kind, but it works great and there are nothing to worry about leeks of your information. No permissions at all, no ads.

title: Best of the best
comment: No ads no crap only crypto! P.S.  Add option to donate btc!
Finally an all in one hasher!

title: Awesome!
comment: I love the compare function. Perfect for when I download a file from my mobile browser. I just copy and paste the provided hash from browser to app!

title: Ahmed
comment: Very usefully app I want to first thanks to the dev for making such a good and useful app.....

title: Blue?
comment: Nice but I don't like the blue background. That should be dark gray like on every good holo app!

title: Awesome
comment: I use hashes for so many different things online. The lack of good android tools made it hard to do many of those things on my phone.. not anymore.

title: Magical
comment: After installing this application my hair grew back again. Also my eyesight improved a bit.

title: Best app for hashes and checksums.
comment: This app does what you want it too and then some. Would be nice if I could disable the blue gradient in the background.

title: Perfect
comment: Awesome should have a save feature to export to a text file to email or dump to cloud drives

title: Sha3 or sha224
comment: Would be four stars, if it supported SHA3 or SHA224. Otherwise, awesome.

title: Just great
comment: Beautiful and functional

title: Amazing
comment: This app will change your life. You won't remember life before this app.

title: Awesome App!
comment: Got it only to be able to check MD5 Checksum's .. and it does it FLAWLESSLY!! Thanks!

title: Nice
comment: Does the job nicely, thanks

title: What I needed
comment: Does exactly what I want, nothing less... looks good as well.

title: Excellent Utility
comment: Thanks for the simple, coherent app. Very fast, very simple. I really like it.  One request, however, would be an option to process a hash file similarly to using the -c option in the md5sum utilty in the GNU coreutils. Batch hashing probably isn't a good idea on a little arm processor, but it would save steps, if multiple hashes need to be checked.

title: I have implemented the feature requested by Pablo.
comment: The dev complied with my request for the source code a few days ago... I specifically requested it so I could implement this feature and will now notify the dev and provide the code for review.  I've also committed it to my GitHub.com/PaulMEdwards/HashDroid/ repo. Yay for Open Source!

title: Perfect
comment: It can't be any easy!!

title: Great app
comment: Great for validating ROM downloads before flashing.

title: Works great
comment: Fast, convenient, well designed, handles everything from MD5 to SHA512. A pleasure to use.

title: Perfect
comment: I love apps that do one thing and do it well. Simple interface, accurate hashing, no special permissions. Perfect.

title: Great and practical app!
comment: Highly recommend  :-)
Excellent.

title: Simple
comment: Does what you expect, simply and easily.

title: Great!
comment: Clean, elegant, and easy to use interface. If you have a need to verify files, this is the app. The dev is responsive as  well.

title: Much more than md5
comment: Has an excellent list of hash functions and no special permissions. Exactly what I was looking for.

title: Does the job
comment: This app is small, requires no price, and can perform a big selection of hash calculations.

title: A highly useful hash total program.
comment: Just the thing when I need a hash total computed for a string from an edit box.  It is also useful for computing hash totals for files in directories in any of the file managers I've used, & being a good tool for download checksums.  The standard as well as less frequently encountered hash total algorithms are all provided.

title: Great for verifying downloads
comment: Simple interface, works great for comparing md5 of ROM and other downloads.  Wish it could auto compare file's checksum to clipboard value, which would save a couple of steps.
muu

title: Open source goodness
comment: Great app, does what its suppose to do with no weird special permissions and its open source. Looks great too! A must have if updating roms and other software. Don't ever brick your phone with corrupted data again!

title: Great tool
comment: Small download size, no special permissions, GPL ... and it works!

title: Crap until it'll read md5 files
comment: It's too simple not to implement

title: Slick!
comment: This app is gravy. Doors what it says and does it well.

title: Does what it says, missing something though
comment: This app works perfectly fine and does what it claims.  However, it would be killer to have a screen where you can paste in a checksum and then select a file to compare directly.  I always forget to paste in the known checksum and when you compute the new one it copies that, so I then have to go back to the download site to re-copy it.

title: Awesome
comment: Love the new look.. Works perfectly on my Galaxy Nexus.

title: Love it!
comment: Love the new icon and UI look.  Use this app all the time for checking hashes from downloaded roms.

comment: Good

comment: What a great app, thanks for making my life easier!

comment: My thanks go to the developer for this simple, perfectly useful open source app!
Great! Works perfect.

title: Works great.
comment: Hate flashing without checking hashcodes.   Always check the hashcodes on nandroid backup files.  Got burned once...never again.

title: Does one thing and does it very well.
comment: This app does what it promises, with no BS and all while looking pretty good for a geek-tool!
Works perfectly, simple UI. I was flashing a ROM onto my D2G, and this app caught a md5 mismatch! The ROM I downloaded was actually corrupted!

comment: A must have for flashing ROMs on the go.

title: Muat have for custom rom owners
comment: Great app. Although I find the text in the file explorer too big for my taste. Nothing that breaks anything though.
Very easy to use. Does what it says. I like the simple interface.
Got this solely for the compare feature, awesome work. If you don't like it don't use it.
Great for flashing roms on the go. Download from rom manager, calculate hash, check against the devs md5, and flash away. Easy to use, thanks.
Perfect!
Very useful !
Much better than AFV and the rest! More up-to-date, fits fullscreen, cleaner interface, and more hashes to choose from. Big thanks!
Does exactly what it says. Unlike others, I found compare useful. Not because of the actual comparing, but because of the two fields to paste in to.
I agree with them below. Comparing is kind of a useless function, but what it needs is converting Hash into text. SGS
Very nice app. Usefull on galaxy tab.
Agreed with the guy below me, has everything you need. The compare part is kind of useless. Just look at the two hashes and compare for yourself.
Pretty much everything you'd need for hashing on Android, MD5 to SHA512, text or files. D2G.
